Text:
Classification: Game Show
Status: Canceled/Ended
Network: BBC TWO ( United Kingdom)
Runtime: 30 Minutes
Premiere: February, 2002
Ended: June, 2002

b1893757 - are you pretending to be stupid here, or are you really that fux0red up?

This is a brand new show to be aired - it was originally scheduled to be shown late 2011, but was deferred by Channel 10 in Oz to now.

It's not a game show, it is not a UK production, the BBC is not the network that ran or commissioned it, and it did not premiere in 2002.

I wouldn't be so hard on him. The real blame should be on the poster for plugging a private torrent site instead of providing a description.

IMDB lists the 2002 show as the only entry.
